value.string: =========== Task gets Global Paths from a text file in Dropbox and will automatically switch to I: Drive if M: Drive is no longer detected ===================================================================================================================
^^^Pulls Global_Paths.txt from the Dropbox (Not the one from the M: Drive) so this file will still work after the I: Drive migration
^^^Loop pulls the needed variables from the Global_Paths.txt file
^^^Tilde\~ to be replaced with system Username
^^^Tilde\~ to be replaced with system Username
^^^Tilde\~ to be replaced with system Username
^^^Tilde\~ to be replaced with system Username
^^^Tilde\~ to be replaced with system Username
^^^Tilde\~ to be replaced with system Username

^^^If this M: Drive folder doesn't exist, all "\\ccifs1sat" mentions in the path variables will be switched to "I:" [NOTE: The exact I: Drive root/path will likely need to be changed when it's settled on]
